gale:repo.gale:text: When using this application you will be presented with several questions and scenarios regarding your personal and professional life. After answering all questions, you will get a personalized advice on how to deal with the symptoms of burnout you might show. Eventually, you can reflect on your own behavior and ideally change that behavior if necessary.

div.p: First you will be presented with a question. This can be either a textual question, or an image.
You are then required to pick an answer.
In the end, you will be presented with tips tailored to the answers you provided.

gale:repo.gale:text: If you know how to use this system, you can continue to the question pages.
